title: tanjam nIyE
sahitya:
tanjam nIyE tAyE endan dayApariyE vEru Edu gatiyE un padam


anupallavi

  vanjam podinda vAzhvil uzhanru manam tigil koNDu nondE vandEn


caraNam    Ashai enRa azhiyAda pishAshenai ATTi vaikka alaindADinEn
ArumillAda anAthai pOl paritavittEn ambikE
Ishan sabEshan naTEshan Ananda naTamADak-kaNDuLLam magizhum
shrI shivakAma sundari undan tiruvaruL tandenai vandAL dEvi magizhum
